structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Nonresident alien -- Distribution of property on death of.
law.text: If a nonresident alien obtains possession of real estate by descent or devise, and dies before the expiration of the period limiting his right of enjoyment or sale, the right thus acquired shall pass by descent or devise. If such heir or devisee is a nonresident alien, the property of the deceased nonresident alien shall be held or disposed of within the period applicable to such alien as provided in KRS 381.290 to 381.330.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 339.
